text: today I'm making mango yogurt smoothie
I'm not quite sure if the smoothie craze
has been replaced by the juicing craze
completely yet but I kind of don't care
because I think that smoothies are
fantastic way to start the day and
making them at home couldn't be easier
I've added two and a half cups of frozen
mango to my blender and to that add one
and a half cups of low-fat yogurt the
great thing about making them at home is
that you get to control the ingredients
in a way that you don't have control
over when you're buying them in a store
and they're a lot less expensive add
some cinnamon about a quarter teaspoon a
little bit of honey and the juice of
half of the lime the lime is great with
the sweetness of the mango they are
quite sweet but sometimes they don't
have a ton of acidity so you want to add
just a little bit of acidity and blend
away the idea here is that you're using
frozen mango to replace the ice ice
waters things down so you don't have to
worry about losing any flavor when you
use frozen fruit that's all there is to
it that's making smoothies at home I
keep all kinds of frozen fruit in my
freezer just for making smoothies frozen
peaches bananas mango buy them at the
peak of season and
